text: In one of the most consequential decisions in U.S. Supreme Court history, the Court struck down President Trump’s global tariffs imposed under IEEPA. Administration already indicated it will impose a 15% global tariff to replace the IEEPA-based tariffs: https://t.co/vmDv079SPw https://t.co/3OsgTJFE5e

SCOTUS’ ruling invalidating certain IEEPA tariffs could reshape importer costs & supply chains. Join to hear our leaders discuss what this means, CBP compliance priorities & practical next steps on exposure, documentation & potential refunds: https://t.co/hwQWSDrSWH https://t.co/HApPav1Vee

U.S. expansion is accelerating driven by tariffs, supply chain issues, the AI boom, and rising energy demand. Site selection isn’t just real estate; it’s a value decision. Learn how to grow without leaving money on the table: https://t.co/AuqbACYHQZ https://t.co/ouB0h5JS3f

Tax and finance can’t operate in silos anymore. When tax has real-time access to finance data and systems, leaders get faster, more accurate insight for compliance, forecasting, and smarter decisions. Learn more on aligning tax and finance: https://t.co/fac5pvmORg https://t.co/8Ojv5nFfU4

Discover recent developments from states that are providing tax incentives for data center investment & practical guidance on taking full advantage of these incentives in our insight, originally in the Journal of State Taxation: https://t.co/VGNhUHBlTM https://t.co/82kNTmy9qM

We are proud to be speaking at Georgetown Institute of International Economic Law’s 47th Annual Trade Update. Don't miss our Damon Pike's session on Thursday, March 12th at 1:45 PM ET. Register here: https://t.co/MuHPo0mdnI https://t.co/iWUkTyN1Xu
Advance planning can help QOF investors manage the impact of the mandatory taxable gain recognition coming at the end of 2026: https://t.co/XZjwHFMkbI https://t.co/K6U8S4oeC4

Join our Unclaimed Property leaders on April 2nd, along with @KTS_Law, to learn about changes in state unclaimed property laws and regulations, including new legislation, enforcement trends, and administrative guidance: https://t.co/zqWKhRwPFd https://t.co/GNg7zxrENl

ESOPs can be a powerful succession tool in construction, but the details matter. BDO Capital Advisor’s insight walks through the key questions and unique considerations to address up front: https://t.co/D6kIYVAZxx https://t.co/YCp2wNp1Qk

QSBS can offer meaningful tax advantages but only if strict requirements are met. From eligibility to documentation & timing, careful planning matters. Our Private Client Services professionals break down what founders and investors need to know: https://t.co/tpYwal0FR5 https://t.co/StqYMYtNrd

Attending @Infocast_events' Solar + Wind Finance & Investment Summit? Don't miss the panel, Tax Credit Monetization & Project Execution: Strategies for Working within OBBB Act Timelines," featuring BDO Capital Advisors' Gabe Rubio. Details here: https://t.co/gZgNPi7ZqY https://t.co/9gC79tntgt

The IRS has published final Forms 8964-ELE and 8964-TRA required to be completed beginning with the 2025 tax year in connection with the final Section 987 regulations issued in December 2024. https://t.co/JscDCRKNcK https://t.co/sYBeN9iOqg

U.S. taxpayers who directly or indirectly receive certain gifts or bequests from former U.S. citizens or long-term U.S. residents classified as “covered expatriates” may have new U.S. federal tax and return filing requirements: https://t.co/BsLzbtVcBb https://t.co/e95n1PvxGt

Trump signed a funding deal on Feb. 3 that locks in significant IRS cuts and funds the government through Sept. 30, 2026, except DHS, which is only funded until Feb. 13 as lawmakers negotiate next steps:  https://t.co/XtR71UlIhR https://t.co/SKTo2ScBU1

We are proud to join the 2026 @ABAesq-@IPTATL Advanced Sales & Use Tax Seminar. Our Melissa Myers will speak on the “Myths and Legends of Sales & Use Tax for Government Contractors” panel. Register here: https://t.co/MqZffxeN5U https://t.co/yGVcu9BmJ6

Knowing the differences between U.S. sales and use tax and VAT can help strengthen indirect tax compliance, improve cash flow management, and reduce the risk of audits, penalties, and interest: https://t.co/X7Pyq2As65 https://t.co/vAwHyj4hTC

We’re proud to sponsor COST’s SALT in a Digital World Workshop (March 2–4, Burlingame, CA). Catch sessions from Paul Burns, Ray Dagarag, Shail Shah, and Shirley Wei. Details and registration: https://t.co/508VensL1V https://t.co/mvurvQfOJR

Our Damon Pike is speaking at the 2026 EFS Conference: Aligning Value – The Intersection of Transfer Pricing, VAT, and Customs in Rotterdam on February 12. Register to hear his session on the U.S. perspective at 3:45 PM CET: https://t.co/PsB45yYdlZ https://t.co/s7N0GagOSt

As part of its City Council’s 2026 revenue ordinance, Chicago has imposed a social media amusement tax on social media businesses, as well as an increase in the personal property lease transaction tax rate: https://t.co/o0B48uYBxj https://t.co/gX0dJCI4AY

Texas has proposed statutory changes that would revisit the Comptroller’s long-standing position on fixed-date IRC conformity (effective as of Jan. 1, 2007): https://t.co/PNpTiZ8jji https://t.co/tlGvyvrBm6
